Handy list of restaurants to try out in Washington, DC area

☐ Convivial [French, 2$]

☐ Ariake [Sushi, 2$, Reston]

☐ Kotobuki [Sushi, 2$]

☐ Toki [Ramen, 2$, Taiwanese]

☐ Daikaya Ramen Shop [Ramen, 2$]

☐ Maketto [Steamed buns, 2$, Cambodian + Taiwanese]

☐ Izakaya Seki [Sushi, 3$]

☐ The Grill Room [American, 3$]

☐ Little Serow [Thai, 3$] + story

☐ Le Diplomate [French, 3$]

☐ Red Hen [Italian, 3$]

☐ Iron Gate [American+Green, 4$]
